Package it.polimi.ingsw.bean.action

Class GameAction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.bean.action.Action
it.polimi.ingsw.bean.action.GameAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConfirmGameAction, IndexTileGameAction, PlaceWorkerActions, SelectGodTurnAction 
public abstract class GameAction
extends Action
Actions are messages generated by the client to make a change to the model, such as moving a worker or building a block. Action is a abstract class extended by many classes.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Details

    • player

      protected transient Player player
      The player's instance who generate the action. It's set by ActionHandler when the action arrived in the GameController

    • isCompatible

      public abstract java.lang.Boolean isCompatible​(Operation operation)
      Method used by GameController to decide if action arrived is compatible with the current operation of turn
      Parameters:
      operation - It's the current operation in Turn
      Returns:
      True if the operation passed like parameter is compatible with the action
      See Also:
      Operation

    • execute

      abstract void execute() throws AlreadyOccupiedException, DomeAlreadyPresentException, AlreadySetException
      It is the most important method of the gameAction, it is overwritten in every sub-class to be able to execute the action in a dynamic way without the controller knowing what type of action it is.
      Throws:
      AlreadyOccupiedException - if the action is trying to perform an operation on an occupied Tile
      DomeAlreadyPresentException - if the action is trying to build on a tile with a dome on it
      AlreadySetException - if the action is trying to assign workers to a player that already has them

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
